thread.title: Probe under way over babies and kids at Himpunan 355 - Nation | The Star Online
thread.title_full: Probe under way over babies and kids at Himpunan 355 - Nation | The Star Online

author: Danial Albakri
title: Probe under way over babies and kids at Himpunan 355 - Nation | The Star Online
text:
Sunday, 19 February 2017 | MYT 4:13 PM Probe under way over babies and kids at Himpunan 355 by danial albakri 
PETALING JAYA: Babies and children brought to the "Himpunan 355" gathering constitute an offence under the Peaceful Assembly Act (PAA) 2012, said Dang Wangi OCPD Asst Comm Mohd Sukri Kaman. 
"Preliminary investigations revealed that the babies and children brought to attend the rally were between seven months and 15 years of age. 
"This is an offence under Section 4(2)(f) of the Peaceful Assembly Act (PAA) 2012," he said in a statement Sunday. 
He added that no arrests have been made yet though the case is still under investigation. 
On Saturday, crowds of purple-clad supporters converged at Padang Merbok, Kuala Lumpur, for a rally organised by PAS in a show of support for party president Datuk Seri Abdul Hadi Awang's Private Member's Bill ahead of Parliament meeting next month. The Bill seeks to increase the penalties provided for in the Syariah Courts (Criminal Jurisdiction) Act 1965 (Act 355).
